EmailTemplate.name: Add Service Presence Copilot White Label
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to White Label Presence Copilot {!Contact.Name}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Primary_Contact_First_Name__c},
We're thrilled to begin your White Label App Onboarding experience! Thank you for choosing us as your partner—it's wonderful to have you on board.
I’m excited to introduce you to Evan Cazes who is copied on this email and will be reaching out shortly with details to kick off your onboarding journey.
If you have any questions or need assistance along the way, please feel free to reach out to Evan. We're here to make sure you have a seamless experience. Can’t wait to get started together!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName}
